given.text: Dana is one of the hardest working and most dedicated people I have ever worked with. As a colleague, Dana gets things done. She evaluates the problem at hand, considers relevant options, picks the most appropriate one and drives towards it with enthusiasm and passion. But Dana not only gets things done, she gets things done well. For her, success is not just finishing a task, project or assignment, success is producing results that exceed expectations. As a manager she both encourages and expects the best of her direct reports, providing advice, assistance and guidance that allows her employees to excel. See less
